content: I received an advance copy of this film courtesy of Brother Tino Struckmann. The film is terrific, I really enjoyed it. There is little about Freemasonry in the film, the principal characters are Freemasons. I recommend it highly!

title: New Film with military Masonic theme "Brother's War"
